project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of the construction and/or furnishing and equipping of industrial training centers, commercial training centers, hotel training schools, occupational safety and health training centers, and rural mobile training units; staff training for instructors, supervisors and administrators; preparation of instructional material; technical assistance in the form of specialists' services and fellowships; manpower studies; and creation and staffing of the Project Unit.
